00125         public function __construct($server, $username, $password, $database, &$log, $type = 'mysql') {
00126                 if(!$log instanceof MAIN_Logger ||
00127                    !is_string($server)   || !is_string($username) ||
00128                    !is_string($password) || !is_string($database)) {
00129                         throw new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::ERROR, 'DB_Database::__construct', 'Incorrect parameter type.', $log);
00130                 }
00131 
00132                 if(isset(self::$globalfunctions[$type])) {
00133                         $this->functions =  self::$globalfunctions[$type];
00134                 } elseif(class_exists($classname = "DB_Database_" . ucfirst(strtolower($type)))) {
00135                         return $classname($server, $username, $password, $database, $log);
00136                 } else {
00137                         throw new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::ERROR, 'DB_Database::__construct', 'Invalid database type.', $log);
00138                 }
00139 
00140                 $this->conndata  =  array($server, $username, $password);
00141                 $this->dbname    =  $database;
00142                 $this->log       =& $log;
00143 
00144                 // Real connection attempt starts here.
00145                 $this->conn      = false;
00146                 $this->connect();
00147                 if($this->conn instanceof MAIN_Error) {
00148                         throw $this->conn;
00149                 }
00150         }

00158         public function connect() {
00159                 /*
00160                  * Check for existing connection first.
00161                  * If so, close it then continue.
00162                  */
00163                 if(is_resource($this->conn)) {
00164                         $this->close();
00165                 } $this->log->log(MAIN_Logger::INFO, 'DB_Database::connect',
00166                                  'Starting database connection with connection data: ' . strtr(var_export($this->conndata, true), "\n", ''));
00167 
00168                 // Check for connect function and connect to server.
00169                 if(!function_exists($this->functions["connect"])) {
00170                         return new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::ERROR, 'DB_Database::connect', 'Connection function does not exist.', $this->log);
00171                 }
00172 
00173                 $retval = call_user_func_array($this->functions["connect"], $this->conndata);
00174 
00175                 // See if connection is valid.
00176                 if($retval === false) {
00177                         return new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::ERROR, 'DB_Database::connect', 'Connection failed for unknown reason.', $this->log);
00178                 } else {
00179                         $this->conn = $retval;
00180                 }
00181 
00182                 // Check for database function and select database.
00183                 if(!function_exists($this->functions["db"])) {
00184                         return new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::ERROR, 'DB_Database::connect', 'Database selection function does not exist.', $this->log);
00185                 }
00186 
00187                 $retval = call_user_func($this->functions["db"], $this->dbname, $this->conn);
00188 
00189                 // See if selection was successful.
00190                 if(!$retval) {
00191                         return new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::ERROR, 'DB_Database::connect', 'Database selection failed (it may not exist).', $this->log);
00192                 }
00193 
00194                 // Get list of tables and load into object.
00195                 $res = $this->query("SHOW TABLES FROM {$this->dbname}");
00196 
00197                 if($res === false) {
00198                         return new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::WARNING, 'DB_Database::connect', 'Could not retrieve a list of tables.', $this->log);
00199                 }
00200 
00201                 $list = array();
00202                 while($row = $this->result($res)) {
00203                         $list[$row[0]] = false;
00204                 } $this->tables = $list;
00205 
00206                 return true;
00207         }

00215         public function close() {
00216                 // If there is no connection, return.
00217                 $this->log->log(MAIN_Logger::INFO, 'DB_Database::close', 'Closing connection.');
00218                 if(!is_resource($this->conn)) {
00219                         return new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::NOTICE, 'DB_Database::connect', 'Closing connection that never opened.', $this->log);
00220                         return true;
00221                 }
00222 
00223                 // Check for close function and close connection.
00224                 if(!function_exists($this->functions["close"])) {
00225                         return new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::ERROR, 'DB_Database::close', 'Function to close connection does not exist.', $this->log);
00226                 }
00227 
00228                 $retval = call_user_func($this->functions["close"], $this->conn);
00229 
00230                 return $retval;
00231         }

00243         public function query($sql) {
00244                 $curtime = gmdate('c');
00245                 $sql = "/* Time: $curtime */ /* DB: {$this->dbname} */ " . $sql;
00246 
00247                 $this->log->log(MAIN_Logger::INFO, 'DB_Database::query', "Making query: $sql");
00248 
00249                 // Check for a connection first.
00250                 if(!is_resource($this->conn)) {
00251                         return new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::WARNING, 'DB_Database::query', 'Database not connected yet.', $this->log);
00252                 }
00253 
00254                 // Check for query function and submit query.
00255                 if(!function_exists($this->functions["query"])) {
00256                         return new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::ERROR, 'DB_Database::query', 'Query function does not exist.', $this->log);
00257                 }
00258 
00259                 $retval = call_user_func($this->functions["query"], $sql, $this->conn);
00260 
00261                 return $retval;
00262         }

00272         public function result($res, $type = "array") {
00273                 // Check for a connection first.
00274                 if(!is_resource($this->conn)) {
00275                         return new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::WARNING, 'DB_Database::result', 'Database not connected yet.', $this->log);
00276                 }
00277 
00278                 /*
00279                  * Check for function and submit query.
00280                  * The function is taken from the array of database
00281                  * functions, using $type as the key.
00282                  */
00283                 if(!function_exists($this->functions[$type])) {
00284                         return new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::ERROR, 'DB_Database::result', 'Result retrieval function does not exist.', $this->log);
00285                 }
00286 
00287                 return call_user_func($this->functions[$type], $res);
00288         }

00297         public function escape($string) {
00298                 // Check for a connection first.
00299                 if(!is_resource($this->conn)) {
00300                         return new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::WARNING, 'DB_Database::escape', 'Database not connected yet.', $this->log);
00301                 }
00302 
00303                 // Check for escape function and escape string.
00304                 if(!function_exists($this->functions["escape"])) {
00305                         return new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::ERROR, 'DB_Database::escape', 'Escape function does not exist.', $this->log);
00306                 }
00307 
00308                 return call_user_func($this->functions["escape"], $string);
00309         }

00321         public function getTable($tablename) {
00322                 $this->log->log(MAIN_Logger::INFO, 'DB_Database::getTable', "Getting table $tablename.");
00323                 if($this->tables[$tablename] instanceof DB_Table) {
00324                         return $this->tables[$tablename];
00325                 } elseif($this->tables[$tablename] === false) {
00326                         $this->tables[$tablename] = new DB_Table($this, $tablename);
00327                         return $this->tables[$tablename];
00328                 } else {
00329                         return new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::WARNING, 'DB_Database::getTable',
00330                                               "$tablename does not exist.");
00331                 }
00332         }
